Event.name: Using_resource
Event.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Agent</fen> has access to a finite amount of some <fen>Resource</fen> and uses it in some way to complete a <fen>Purpose</fen>. The specific <fen>Portion</fen> of the <fen>Resource</fen> may be stated, and after the <fen>Resource</fen> is spent, it is no longer available to the <fen>Agent</fen>. The <fen>Means</fen> by which the <fen>Resource</fen> is used may be mentioned, but it is often implied by the stated Purpose or understood based on what the <fen>Resource</fen> is.
<ex><fex name="Agent">I</fex> <t>used</t> <fex name="Portion">half</fex> <fex name="Resource">of the bag of dirt</fex> <fex name="Purpose">to plant the roses</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Agent">She</fex> just <t>spends</t> <fex name="Resource">all her time</fex> <fex name="Purpose">sitting in front of the television</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Agent
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person who depletes a Resource to achieve some Goal</def-root>

Arg.name: Resource
Arg.definition: <def-root>The exhaustible commodity that the <fen>Agent</fen> has access to.</def-root>

Arg.name: Purpose
Arg.definition: <def-root>What the <fen>Agent</fen> is attempting to achieve by using the <fen>Resource</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Portion
Arg.definition: <def-root>The amount of the <fen>Resource</fen> that the <fen>Agent</fen> uses to achieve the <fen>Purpose</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>A more specific description of how the <fen>Purpose</fen> is achieved by spending the <fen>Resource</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>Any description of the intentional act which is not covered by more specific FEs, including secondary effects (<ment>quietly, loudly</ment>), and general descriptions comparing events (<ment>the same way</ment>). In addition, it may indicate salient characteristics of an <fen>Agent</fen> that also affect the action (<ment> deliberately, eagerly, carefully</ment>). </def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>The physical location where the <fen>Resource</fen> is used.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>The time at which the <fen>Resource</fen> is used.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: use.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: deplete a portion of an exhaustible commodity

lexUnit.name: spend.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: expend a portion of a commodity
